posts.title: Irene outsold
posts.author: mandeuk
posts.body: What do I say? Do you ever wonder how fallen angels look like? And I have a working theory, that maybe, just maybe, Bae Irene is not human at all

posts.title: Seulgi is the best daddy of them all
posts.subtitle: and im not even kidding
posts.author: chichu
posts.body: Ugh. Such power she holds. I don't even know how i managed to bring myself together. She's so powerful. A woman is crying and that woman is me. Ugh, her mind.

posts.title: YG can choke
posts.subtitle: and is a snake
posts.author: mandeuk
posts.body: YG can choke. He doesn't value his artists. He doesn't promote them that much. He's wasting TALENT. The nerve of that guy!

posts.title: Is water wet?
posts.author: ddeulgi
posts.body: If water is like air for fishes... then is water wet for them? How do they know what's wet or not? Does being in the air the equivalent of us drowning in water? Fishes... i wonder

posts.title: A snake
posts.author: ddeulgi

posts.title: Lavender
posts.author: baechu
posts.body: Lavender, an herb with many culinary uses, also makes a stunning addition to borders and perennial gardens, providing sweeping drifts of color from early summer into fall. With its silvery-green foliage, upright flower spikes and compact shrub-like form, lavender is ideal for creating informal hedges. You can also harvest it for fragrant floral arrangements, sachets, and potpourri.

posts.title: Jennie come back
posts.subtitle: and stay with me
posts.author: chichu
posts.body: Should have noticed it sooner. Should have been there when you needed me the most. But now that you're gone, can't do anything but to remember. All of the moments we shared together. All of the sleepovers we had. I wish we can have that again. But i guess it's too late. Too late to say I love you.

posts.title: I miss you
posts.author: mandeuk
posts.body: Cant do anything but to blame myself. Fell in love with the wrong person. In the wrong place. In the wrong time!

posts.title: Slug is a hot too
posts.subtitle: but of course the bae is the best
posts.author: mandeuk
posts.body: I mean, look at that girl. How can be so soft as a teddy bear and at the end slay us all with her hotness?
